attributes.action: Allow those that have served this countrys armed forces to live in it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age when the UK has opened its doors to anybody including terrorists from around the world how can it be right to deny the brave Gurkas who have fought for this country citizenship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
